name: Jewel Bling! Free
description:
★★★ We celebrate 3 million downloads with 50% OFF SALE of Bubble Bust! (premium version) Get it now and don't miss out! ★★★
★ Full version Featured worldwide by Apple in New & Noteworthy Games! ★

Jewel Bling! is a simple yet addictive puzzle game in which your goal is to put all the jewel pieces together within the given puzzle shape. If you get stuck you can always ask for a hint or even let your iPhone/iPod touch solve the puzzle for you.

There are many puzzles to choose from, with two difficulty levels. And as the game tracks your personal best moves and lets you earn silver and gold stars for each puzzle, you always have a new record to beat and gold stars to collect!

So addictive, you'll keep telling yourself "just ONE more..." :)

FEATURES:
* Beautiful graphics with high resolution Retina support
* Unique and addictive gameplay
* Two different difficulty levels to enjoy
* Tracks personal records for each puzzle
* Three star ranking system
* Clever hint system
* Let your iPhone/iPod touch solve the puzzle
* Unlimited undo

This is the free version of the game, for the full range of features, upgrade to the premium version.

FULL VERSION FEATURES:
* High resolution Retina support
* 104 all new puzzles for many hours of challenging fun
* Three different difficulty levels to enjoy
* Global high scores
* Excellent replay value
* Fun stats and much more!

Please contact us through the support link below if you experience any problems with the game, or if you would like to share your ideas on how to further improve the game.

Developed and published by GameOn
